code: import{GET_BRAND}from"./actiontype";import axios from"axios";var getbrandsurl="http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/brand/lists";export function getBrands(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get(getbrandsurl).then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_BRAND,payload:res.data});});};}export function addBrand(data,ownProps){return function(dispatch){axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/brand/save",{brandname:data}).then(function(res){alert("successfully updated");dispatch({type:GET_BRAND,payload:res.data});ownProps.history.push('/admin/brand/manage');});};}export function updateBrand(data,ownProps){return function(dispatch){axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/brand/update",{brandname:data.name,brandid:data.id}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_BRAND,payload:res.data});ownProps.history.push('/admin/brand/manage');});};}
